| HistoryText             = The [[Namor McKenzie (Earth-616)|Sub-Mariner]] was asked by the local authorities to help investigate the disappearances of workers seeking jobs. Namor and [[Aquaria Neptunia (Earth-616)|Namora]] uncovered that he Porker Gang was luring them with job offers and then forcing them into slavery to mine pearls from an underwater cavern. The pair freed the slave and brought Porker and his gang to justice.{{r|Sub-Mariner Comics #30}}
